settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.title: More Health-Conscious Eating
settings.text: If you want to shed a few pounds or lower your cholesterol, a vegetarian diet is for you. According to countless studies, avoiding animal proteins is one of the best ways to improve your health.

settings.title: Enjoy Family Meals Again
settings.text: From parmesan-crusted chicken to chickpea tagine, every meal offered by Table & Twine only takes 15 minutes to prepare. That means even if your wife orders a beef steak and you order a cauliflower steak, the two of you can enjoy a delicious dinner together.

settings.title: Fun, Exciting Fare
settings.text: As a new vegetarian, it’s easy to fall into a food rut. But when you order a vegetarian meal kit in Charleston, you’ll enjoy new, fun menu items each week. Enjoy our chef’s plant-based take on southern fare on Monday. Then, on Tuesday, travel to India for spicy coconut curry.

settings.section_heading: Why Choose a Vegetarian Meal Kit?
settings.text: Developing meat-free meals can be tedious. Between chopping vegetables and marinating tofu, you have little time to actually enjoy your food. Fortunately, Table & Twine is here to add convenience and flavor to your day-to-day life. Other benefits of a vegetarian meal kit in Charleston include:

100% Meat-Free: When you dine with Table & Twine, you don’t have to worry about bacon grease in the green beans or beef stock in the soup. No, our chefs very carefully select 100% meat-free ingredients to prepare exciting plant-based meals.

Locally-Sourced Produce: Unlike other meal subscription services, we don’t source fruits and vegetables from huge conglomerates. Instead, we develop relationships with local farmers who use sustainable growing practices and provide us with the highest quality produce possible.

15-Minute Prep Time: Vegetables can be finicky. Leeks must be rinsed and Brussels sprouts chopped. This prep work takes time. Luckily, when you order a vegetarian meal kit from Table & Twine, our talented chefs do all the hard work for you.

Chef-Curated Menus: Since our meals are developed and prepared by actual chefs, every dish is delicious and thoughtfully crafted. Even better, our culinary team reveals a new, exciting menu each week.

settings.heading: {{ collection.metafields.custom.second_heading.value }}
settings.heading2: What To Expect From Our Vegetarian Meal Service
settings.text2: Charleston residents love our vegetarian prepared dinners because they make following a plant-based diet convenient and tasty.

settings.title: Do you have to be a vegetarian to enjoy vegetarian meals?
settings.text: No! Since our vegetarian meals incorporate a variety of fruits, vegetables, grains, and proteins, they’re satisfying to all – even meat lovers.

settings.title: Can I pick the recipes included in my vegetarian meal kit?
settings.text: Of course. Each week, you’ll select meals from a long list of plant-based recipes. This ensures a personalized culinary experience.

settings.title: What’s included in my Charleston vegetarian meal kit?
settings.text: In your box, you’ll receive all the pre-prepared ingredients needed to create a delicious, meat-free entrée.

settings.title: Will I benefit from a vegetarian meal kit?
settings.text: Sticking to a way of eating can be tough, but we've taken care of all of the challenging parts. Choosing the right vegetables? Already done. Making sure everything is fresh? Check it off your list. Preparing all of the foods? Covered.

settings.heading: Heating Instructions
settings.text: Preparing an allergy-friendly meal by Table & Twine is simple! Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for easy-to-follow heating instructions. These instructions are also available online.
